title: Ticket #1182: hook documentation does not state the privs each hook has
description:
http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/manual/v7.4/4_4Job_Hooks.html

The job hooks are invoked with different privs. For instance, the fetch hook is invoked with condor privs (or the user running the startd), and the status hook is invoked with the job owner's privs (or whatever account the job is running under). This is important information for hook writers and should be reflected in the manual for all hooks.
